name: Laudica (V)
Lore: 'Corellian gun-runner. Skilled markswoman. Friends with Brindy Truchong and the Tonnika sisters. Romantically involved with Rayc Ryjerd, against her better judgment.',
Text: 'While Rayc Ryjerd or Tonnika Sisters on table, power +3. Whenever opponent Force drains at a non-battleground, you may retrieve 1 Force. During your deploy phase, may deploy an Effect with ''matching'' in game text on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
